Name: Russian AYE Race
About the game: 20!8, the usual rural guy Ivan wanted to add adrenaline to his life - he decided to take part in the illegal 'AYE' races, which took place all over Russia. Ivan took the old car from his grandfather, drank vodka, so it was not scary at the races, and went to the starting point of the race. You are playing for a usual rural Russian guy who decided to participate in the illegal 'AYE' races in the vastness of Russia, and you need to drive, collect vodka and avoid the police. Features: -Ability to see Russia -Ability to visit and even participate in illegal 'AYE' races -Vodka, old car, police and Russia -Game genre: Racing - Multiple maps available for playing -Simple and fun gameplay -Pixel art graphics -Good soundtrack -Steam achievements
